text: Choose opportunities where your strengths give you an edge over competitors.
source_book: Your Next Five Moves Patrick Bet David

text: IF  THEN Select a path where you have an inherent advantage relative to others.
source_book: Your Next Five Moves Patrick Bet David

text: IF  THEN Base career decisions on self-awareness and comparative analysis.

text: CLAIM: Money facilitates movement but does not dictate direction.

text: IF  THEN Commit decisively before undertaking complex leadership roles.

text: CLAIM: There are four strategic areas essential for CEO effectiveness.

text: Balance frugality with strategic investment to sustain growth.

text: Maintain focus on core objectives to avoid distraction and momentum loss.

text: IF  THEN Analyze the source and motivations of advisors before accepting their influence.

text: IF  THEN Avoid extremes in spending by ensuring investments align with long-term goals.

text: IF  THEN Adapt strategies based on changing market conditions rather than persisting with outdated approaches.

text: CLAIM: Excessive caution can hinder progress by allowing competitors to capitalize on inaction.

text: Anticipate the worst possible outcomes before acting.

text: Manage ego by surrounding oneself with truth-tellers.

text: IF  THEN Mitigate potential negative outcomes by identifying and addressing them.

text: IF  THEN Commit to deciding on the next three immediate actions to avoid paralysis.

text: IF  THEN Surround yourself with a small group of people who provide honest feedback to keep ego in check.

text: CLAIM: Ego can be managed through a support system of truth-tellers.

text: CLAIM: Alliances can be built by overcoming personal pride and focusing on mutual benefit.

text: IF  THEN Embody future aspirations by drawing on past emotional and experiential foundations.
